Package sudoku

Class sudoku

java.lang.Object
sudoku.sudoku
All Implemented Interfaces:
sudoku.SudokuSolver
public class sudoku
extends java.lang.Object
implements sudoku.SudokuSolver
A simple sudoku implementation of the sudoku interface.
Author:
erikb, maxsj.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    sudoku()
    Constructs an empty sudoku grid with default dimensions (9x9).

  • Method Summary

    void clear()
    Empties all boxes in sudoku.

    Fills the grid with the numbers in nbrs.

      public boolean isValid​(int r, int c, int nbr)
      Description copied from interface: sudoku.SudokuSolver
      Checks if nbr on r, c follows sudoku rules.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      r - The row
      c - The column
      nbr - The number to insert in box r, c
      Returns:
